DOC.HEADLINE: REGION ; WORKSHOP PLANNED FOR VICTIMS OF QUAKE , FIRES
DOC.TEXT: Southern California ' s utility companies and agencies will hold a free workshop Saturday to help people whose homes were damaged or lost in the Jan . 17 earthquake or last fall ' s brush_fires rebuild more energy-efficient homes . While the session is planned for the victims of natural disasters , the public also is invited , according to Southern California Edison , one of the sponsors . The workshop also was sponsored by the Gas Co. , the California Energy Commission , the U.S. Department_of_Energy , the Metropolitan Water District and the Los Angeles Department of Water and Power . It will be held from 8:30 to 11:30 a.m. at Edison ' s Customer Technology Application Center , 6090 Irwindale Ave. , Irwindale . Information : ( 800 ) 336-CTAC .
